method.text: Preheat oven to 190°C (or as needed for roast).
Place oil and butter in a roasting tin. Put in the hot oven.
Put the potatoes into a pan  of boiling water. Return to the boil and simmer for 8-10 min. Drain water from pan. Shake pan to roughen the edges of the potatoes a little.
Transfer potatoes to the hot roasting tin. Sprinkle liberally with salt. Place in oven to cook with roast for about 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>1</sub> days.
Baste potatoes occasionally with the oil in the tin. Cook until golden brown and crispy.
